section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Advance directive" has the meaning stated in § 5-601 of the Health - General Article.
"Carrier" does not include a managed care organization.

text.section:
A carrier shall provide the advance directive information sheet developed under § 5-615 of the Health - General Article:
in the carrier's member publications;
if the carrier maintains a Web site on the Internet, on the carrier's Web site; and
at the request of a member.
